business.headline: M&M shares rise over 4% after UBS upgrade. 3 things investors should know M&M stock price: The brokerage said the recent 19% correction in M&M's share price, compared to Nifty Auto's 13% decline, was an overreaction to EV-related concerns.

Services sector growth accelerates in February backed by strong demandHSBC's final India services Purchasing Managers' Index, compiled by S&P Global, rose to 59.0 in February from January's 26-month low of 56.5 but was lower than a preliminary estimate of 61.1.

What are reciprocal tariffs that Donald Trump mentioned in Congress address?US President Donald Trump announced the implementation of reciprocal tariffs starting next month while addressing a joint session of the US Congress.

Sensex surges 800 points. Why is the stock market rising today?Today's rebound has brought much-needed relief to traders on Dalal Street, reviving hopes of a broader recovery in the days ahead. Here's what's driving the rally and whether the downturn has bottomed out.

Explained: Why Coforge shares jumped nearly 10% todayCoforge share price: The stock reached an intraday high of Rs 7,924.50 in early trade and was up 8.65% to Rs 7,827.25 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) at 10:20 am.

Sensex, Nifty bounce back as IT stocks rally; investors remain waryThe Nifty IT index jumped nearly 2%, buoyed by a 10 % surge in Coforge after it signed a 13-year, $1.56 billion deal with Sabre Corp.

Struggling to find your old mutual fund investments? Let Sebi's Mitra help With over 7.5 million inactive folios across different asset management companies (AMCs), Mitra is designed to help investors recover their forgotten investments.
Does marriage impact your credit score? All you need to know While regular payments can improve both scores, any late or default on payments can considerably impact both the scores.

India's exports under pressure as US and EU tighten trade policiesUS President Donald Trump's plan to impose reciprocal tariffs from April is a major concern for Indian exporters, particularly in sectors like automobiles, agriculture, and manufacturing.

Nifty falls for 10th straight day, longest daily losing streak since 1996 launchNifty has registered a 10-day losing streak amid multiple triggers, including relentless selling by foreign investors and fears of an escalating trade war.
Sensex, Nifty end lower as trade war fears keep investors on edgeThe S&P BSE Sensex ended 96.01 points lower at 72,989.93 at the closing bell, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 36.65 points to 22,082.65.

Stock market correction: Here's how to pick quality stocksDuring a market downturn, investors must be careful about stock selection. Choosing the right stocks can help minimise losses and create long-term gains.

entertainment.headline: Kanye West's wife Bianca goes nude again after controversial Grammy outingKanye West's wife Bianca Censori went nude for a photoshoot. This comes a month after her controversial 'nude' outfit at the Grammys.

Actor Shoaib Ibrahim reacts to divorce rumours: Dipika ne diya mujhe dhokhaTelevision couple, Dipika Kakar and Shoaib Ibrahim have found themselves at the center of the separation rumours. The two addressed the same in their new vlog on YouTube.

Shonali Bose on DU, Miranda House's objection to Ziddi Girls: It was heartbreakingPrime Video's Ziddi Girls faced backlash from sections of Delhi University and Miranda House students over perceived negative portrayal, but director Shonali Bose clarifies the trailer was misunderstood and most students ultimately enjoyed the show.

Anora OTT release: When and where to watch the Oscar-winning Best FilmThe Oscar-winning film 'Anora' is set to stream on JioHotstar from March 17. Directed by Sean Baker and starring Mikey Madison, who won Best Actress, the movie offers a thought-provoking narrative.
Singer Dolly Parton's husband Carl Dean dies at 82Carl Dean, husband of Dolly Parton and inspiration for her hit song, Jolene, has died at the age of 82.

Blackpink's Lisa on her new album Alter Ego: Want people to feel empoweredLisa of Blackpink recently spoke about her new solo album, Alter Ego. In a virtual panel discussion, the singer shared her desire to make listeners feel empowered with her new album.

Taarak Mehta actor Deepti Sadhwani turns showstopper at Milan Fashion WeekTaarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah actor Deepti Sadhwani turned showstopper at Milan Fashion Week. The actor shared stunning photos from her rampwalk.

Kaam Idhar Udhar Hogaya: YouTuber Ashish Chanchlani on India's Got Latent rowYouTuber Ashish Chanchlani got emotional in his first video after his appearance on comedian Samay Raina's India's Got Latent show.

Maharani 4 teaser: Huma Qureshi returns as Rani Bharti to safeguard BiharActor Huma Qureshi is set to return as Rani Bharti in Maharani Season 4. The makers announced the news with the teaser of the upcoming gripping series.

TV show Tenali Rama set catches fire, shoot haltedA fire broke out on the set of TV show Tenali Rama due to a generator malfunction, halting production. There were no casualties, but the set suffered damage and repairs are underway.

Be Happy: Abhishek Bachchan reunites with Ludo co-actor Inayat in feel-good filmThe trailer of Abhishek Bachchan and Inayat Verma's upcoming dance-drama Be Happy was released today. Directed by Remo D'Souza, the heartfelt film will premiere on Prime Video on March 14.

BTS' J-hope's Seoul concert: New song, fan proposal and special appearance by JinBTS member and rapper J-hope recently held a concert in Seoul which was attended by his close friend and singer Kim Seokjin (Jin). The concert was one big event for the fans as it consisted of many other surprises besides the central performance by the artiste.

Khakee The Bengal Chapter: Jeet and Prosenjit announce release date with fun clipThe next installment of Netflix's critically acclaimed thriller series Khakee, Khakee: The Bengal Chapter will premiere on Netflix in March. The makers of the show announced its release date with a fun video.

Anupamaa actor Sudhanshu Pandey breaks silence on rumoured feud with Rupali GangulyActor Sudhanshu Pandey has addressed the ongoing rumours about a feud with his Anupamaa co-star Rupali Ganguly. In an interview, he clarified the situation and dismissed the speculations.

BRIT Awards 2025: Charli XCX wins album of the year, full winners list hereCharli XCX emerged as a major winner at the Brit Awards 2025, securing multiple accolades. Artists including Sabrina Carpenter and Billie Eilish also took home some of the biggest awards of the night.

Honey Singh's Millionaire Delhi concert: A night of nostalgia, iconic hitsHoney Singh's Delhi concert was packed with nostalgic hits, emotional tributes, surprise guests, and exclusive remixes. The rapper promised bigger things ahead as his Millionaire Tour continues.

Justin Bieber celebrates 31st birthday with family, shares rare pics of son JackPop sensation Justin Bieber marked his 31st birthday with a heartwarming family gathering. He shared rare photos with wife Hailey and their son Jack, capturing the joyous occasion.

Singer Billy Joel stumbles and falls mid-performance, fans say 'that's painful'During a recent performance, legendary musician Billy Joel stumbled and fell onstage, causing fans to worry about his health. The incident has sparked widespread concern and discussions about the artist's well-being.

At sold-out Delhi concert, Honey Singh vows to bring Grammys to India. WatchAt his Delhi concert, Honey Singh wowed fans with his hits and vowed to bring a Grammy to India, inspired by AR Rahman's Oscars win. He also expressed his deep love for Delhi and its people.

Honey Singh set to perform in Delhi, excited fans rush to the venueSinger and rapper Honey Singh is set to perform in Delhi today as part of his ongoing Millionaire India tour. Ahead of the concert, excited fans were seen rushing to the venue as soon as the gates opened.

Honey Singh on online negativity against him: I've been here before YouTube existedSinger and rapper Honey Singh took a dig at those spreading negativity about him through YouTube podcasts. During his Lucknow concert last night, he also spoke about his lifestyle changes.

Shreya Ghoshal's X account hacked: Tried every thing in my capacityRenowned singer Shreya Ghoshal has disclosed that her X account has been compromised since February 13. Despite efforts, she remains unable to access or delete the account.
Splitsvilla 15's Rushali Yadav-Harsh Arora engaged: Just perfectly usSplitsvilla 15 contestants Rushali Yadav and Harsh Arora are now engaged. The couple fell in love on the show.

Nadaaniyan trailer: Ibrahim, Khushi's romance comes with a priceIbrahim Ali Khan is all set to making his acting debut in Nadaaniyan, a love story with a secret deal. Also starring Khushi Kapoor, the film explores romance, ambition, and chaos. It will start streaming on Netflix from March 7.

Honey Singh returns to Delhi for sold-out Millionaire concert: What to expectYo Yo Honey Singh's Millionaire India Tour hits Delhi with a sold-out show, 20,000 fans, top celebs, and a surprise setlist. His parents will attend the concert, making this emotional homecoming extra special.

Honey Singh wishes to team up with Diljit Dosanjh, urges fans to make it happenSinger Honey Singh, currently touring India for his Millionaire India Tour, expressed his desire to collaborate with Diljit Dosanjh again during his recent concert in Lucknow. He urged fans to tag the Peaches singer, hoping to reunite for a new project.

Shabana Azmi reacts to comparisons between Dabba Cartel and Saas, Bahu Aur FlamingoShabana Azmi addressed concerns over comparisons between her Netflix show Dabba Cartel and Dimple Kapadia's Saas, Bahu Aur Flamingo, emphasising the unique elements of each series.

Singer Palash Sen on Diljit's concert culture remark, Euphoria 2.0 and remixesEuphoria's lead vocalist Palash Sen opened up about Diljit Dosanjh's controversial concert culture remark, the rebranding of the band and more in an exclusive interaction with India Today Digital. Sen recently collaborated with Bollywood star Akshay Kumar on the song, Mahakal Chalo.

Alter Ego review: Blackpink's Lisa's album is versatile and powerfulLisa of Blackpink releases her solo album Alter Ego. With a total of 15 songs and several collaborations, the album has a lot to take away from, but Lisa shines the brightest in her solo elements.

Ek Badnaam Aashram 3 part 2 review: Baba Nirala's journey meets a dramatic endReleased-Thu Feb 27, 2025Prakash Jha's most anticipated series, Aashram Season 3 Part 2, is currently streaming on MX Player. The series focusses on Baba Nirala's fate and how his entire kingdom crashes down because of Pammi's quest for revenge.

Dabba Cartel review: Shabana Azmi is a silent lioness in a challenging storyReleased-Fri Feb 28, 2025'Dabba Cartel' is supposed to be a powerful story of five women who team up to run a cartel in Mumbai. But, the Netflix series ends up becoming a mushy pie.

G-Dragon's Übermensch album is out: A long-overdue masterpieceK-pop King G-Dragon is back with a new album after over a decade. Titled Übermensch, the album is a long-overdue masterpiece the fans deserved.

Japanese woman summoned for kissing BTS' Jin without consentA Japanese woman has been summoned by the South Korean police after she kissed BTS member Jin without his consent during a fan event held last summer.

Suzhal The Vortex 2 review: This crime-drama is trapped in the vortex of clichesReleased-Fri Feb 28, 2025Suzhal - The Vortex 2 review: Created by Pushkar and Gayatri, Suzhal - The Vortex 2 is a crime drama that suffers from overstuffed ideas. The show has interesting ideas, but it gets lost in the overstretched screenplay.

Meghan Markle discusses food, music and Korea in new glimpse of 'With Love, Meghan'Meghan Markle and chef Roy Choi bond over food and the culture of South Korea as they discuss Karoake bars and music in the new promo for her Netflix show, 'With Love, Meghan'.

Composer Pritam thanks Mumbai Police for arresting studio theft culpritMusic composer Pritam expressed gratitude towards the Mumbai Police for capturing the suspect involved in a Rs 40 lakh theft from his studio. He praised their efforts in a heartfelt Instagram post.

The Boys 5: Supernatural actors Jensen Ackles, Jared Padalecki to reuniteThe Boys Season 5 will be an exciting reunion as Soldier Boy Jensen Ackles will be joined by his Supernatural co-stars Jared Padalecki and Misha Collins.

Suits LA review: Sass, swag and secrets in a soggy spin-offReleased-Mon Feb 24, 2025'Suits LA' has the flavour of the original 'Suits', but Teddy Black is no Harvey Spector, and you will be reminded of it, despite all the pizazz in the show.

Oscar-nominated Savan Kotecha to find India's first global boy bandSavan Kotecha is launching a nationwide hunt for India's first global boy band. Partnering with Universal Music, he aims to build a teen pop economy and create Indian stars for the world stage.

Undercover High School review: Korean 'Main Hoon Na' with more thrillsReleased-Fri Feb 21, 2025Undercover High School review: It is a thrilling Korean series blending action and comedy, reminiscent of 'Main Hoon Na', where a disgraced spy navigates high school challenges while on a mission to find missing gold.

general news.headline: America is back: Trump touts tariffs, woke crackdown in joint Congress addressDonald Trump hailed sweeping policy shifts in a defiant address to a joint Congress session, touting aggressive foreign moves, trade disputes, and a crackdown on diversity programs as hallmarks of his administration's rapid transformation.

Trump vows reciprocal tariffs against India, China from April 2: We'll tax themDonald Trump's pledge for reciprocal tariffs came a day after his new 25 per cent tariffs on Canadian and Mexican imports took effect, along with a doubling of duties on Chinese goods to 20 per cent. As a result, the three countries have announced retaliatory measures against the US.

Steve Smith retires from ODIs after Australia crash out in semisChampions Trophy: Steve Smith has retired from ODIs after Australia failed to go through to the final of the mega event following the four-wicket loss to India on Tuesday at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.

You want war, you'll have it: China breathes fire as US vows reciprocal tariffsDonald Trump has accused China of failing to stop the export of chemicals used in the production of opioid fentanyl to justify the imposition of tariffs on Chinese goods.

Champions Trophy: A whodunnit in reverse, starring invincible India The Champions Trophy feels like a whodunnit in reverse -- its ending obvious from the start, with India crushing Australia in a lopsided semi-final. Every time Australia dared to dream, India punched them in the face, and didn't let the game stray from its inevitable ending.

Kannada actor arrested for smuggling gold worth Rs 12 crore at Bengaluru airportKannada actress Ranya Rao was arrested at Bengaluru airport for allegedly smuggling 14.8 kg of gold worth Rs 12 crore from Dubai. Authorities are probing possible syndicate links and law enforcement involvement.

He's going to do a great job: Trump praises FBI's Kash Patel in Congress speechUS President Donald Trump praised FBI Director Kash Patel during his first joint address to Congress, crediting him with restoring trust in a "weaponised" justice system.

You judge Rohit Sharma by stats, we judge by impact: Gautam GambhirChampions Trophy 2025: Head coach Gautam Gambhir was unimpressed when he was asked about Rohit Sharma's future, moments after India beat Australia in the semi-final in Dubai on Tuesday.

Watch: Trump backs Melania's anti-revenge porn bill, jokes about using it himselfPresident Donald Trump endorsed First Lady Melania Trump's advocacy for a federal revenge porn law but drew mixed reactions after joking about invoking the protections himself against online criticism.

Amid fat-shaming row, Congress leader's climbdown after India defeat AustraliaCongress leader Shama Mohamed, who courted a massive controversy by fat-shaming Rohit Sharma, congratulated Team India for defeating Australia in the semi-final of the Champions Trophy in Dubai under his captaincy.

What are reciprocal tariffs that Donald Trump mentioned in Congress address?US President Donald Trump announced the implementation of reciprocal tariffs starting next month while addressing a joint session of the US Congress.

Why Dhananjay Munde resigned from Devendra Fadnavis cabinetThe torture and murder of a sarpanch and an extortion case in the NCP leader's Beed district had become a major embarrassment for the Mahayuti government

Trump appoints 13-year-old cancer survivor as Secret Service agent, youngest everIn a touching moment during his first joint session address, US President Donald Trump made 13-year-old DJ Daniel, a Texas boy battling cancer since 2018, an honorary Secret Service agent.

Trump cites 'important letter' from Zelenskyy in Congress speech days after spatTrump Congress speech: Donald Trump, who has pledged to end the Ukraine war, said his administration had received 'strong signals' from Russia that it was ready for peace.

Sensex surges 800 points. Why is the stock market rising today?Today's rebound has brought much-needed relief to traders on Dalal Street, reviving hopes of a broader recovery in the days ahead. Here's what's driving the rally and whether the downturn has bottomed out.

Five reasons why South India is resisting the 'North' pushThe divisions are seen to have only deepened under BJP-led central rule, prompting a fierce confrontation and counter from Opposition-ruled southern states

Watch: Virat Kohli fist pumps in joy as Anushka Sharma cheers for himChampions Trophy 2025: Virat Kohli celebrated wholeheartedly as his wife Anushka Sharma cheered for him from the stands after India beat Australia in the semi-final.

Video: Texas Democrat disrupts Trump address to Congress, says you have no mandateAs Donald Trump started his joint address to Congress, Democrat lawmakers held up small black signs printed with "False" in white lettering. They held up the signs every time Trump boasted of his accomplishments. One even shouted, "lie after lie after lie".

It's like green card, but better: Trump touts gold card visa for immigrantsOn February 25, Donald Trump unveiled plans to offer a "gold card" visa with a path to citizenship for $5 million, replacing a 35-year-old visa for investors. As per the President, the new visas would function similarly to green cards, which allow immigrants of varying incomes to live and work permanently in the US, but would go to "high-level people".

DMK member caught on camera trying to steal bangle during anti-Hindi pledgeA DMK member was caught attempting to steal a bangle during a pledge ceremony. Tamil Nadu BJP president K Annamalai condemned the incident, and said that "thieves and DMK cannot be separated." Annamalai, who has been a vocal critic of DMK, used the video to support his claims of the party's corruption.

Watch Nasa's Blue Ghost land on the Moon in real-timeBlue Ghost's successful touchdown was captured in a stunning nearly three-minute video released by Firefly, showcasing the lunar lander's descent and landing.

Even Democrats appreciate him, but won't admit it: Trump's praise for Elon MuskDuring his joint address to Congress, US President Donald Trump praised Tesla CEO Elon Musk for leading the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE), adding that even Democrats secretly appreciate his efforts.

Random country: JD Vance mocks UK's Ukraine peacekeeping plan, sparks furyUS Vice President JD Vance has denied targeting Britain or France with his remarks on a European peacekeeping force in Ukraine after facing sharp criticism.

Chinese temple cat 'blesses' visitors with high-fives. Video goes viralIn a short video that was posted by the Instagram account 'China Focus', the cat was seen extending its paw to visitors in order to "bless" them.

Nani's The Paradise: Rooted storytelling or reinforcing stereotypes?The first glimpse of The Paradise has sparked intrigue with its striking visuals, intense score, and Nani's drastic transformation. Srikanth Odela, who made his debut with Dasara, brought a raw and rustic Telangana tale into mainstream Telugu cinema with commercial elements. With The Paradise, he elevates it to a pan-India level.

Inside Karan Johar, Nora Fatehi's glamorous night at Oscars after-partyKaran Johar and Nora Fatehi attended the Oscars after-party in Beverly Hills. Lilly Singh shared glimpses from the Vanity Fair bash, where Nora stunned in gold and KJo posed with global stars.

Amitabh Bachchan got superstitious during IND vs AUS: Where to sit, how to sitAmitabh Bachchan got superstitious before India's Champions Trophy semi-final win over Australia. The actor debated watching and even questioned his sitting position before celebrating the victory.

Malayalam actor Anaswara Rajan hits back at director over non-cooperation claimsMalayalam actor Anaswara Rajan issued a statement responding to 'Mr & Mrs Bachelor' director Deepu Karunakaran's allegations against her. He alleged that Anaswara refused to fulfil her commitments by not promoting the film.

sports.headline: Steve Smith retires from ODIs after Australia crash out in semisChampions Trophy: Steve Smith has retired from ODIs after Australia failed to go through to the final of the mega event following the four-wicket loss to India on Tuesday at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.

Watch: Inimitable Ravi Shastri lights up dressing room ceremony after India's semifinal winRavi Shastri lit up the Indian dressing room in typical fashion after their win against Australia in the semi-final of the Champions Trophy 2025. Shastri delivered a motivational message to the Indian team after the win.

He's always been a thorn: Bavuma, South Africa plot against WilliamsonChampions Trophy 2025: Temba Bavuma said that South Africa have the plans to get the better of Kane Williamson when they meet New Zealand in the second semi-final in Lahore.

IND vs AUS: KL Rahul's knock was redemption for World Cup final, says RayuduAmbati Rayudu feels that KL Rahul's knock against Australia in the semi-final of the Champions Trophy was his way of redeeming himself for the ODI World Cup 2023 final against the same opponents. Rahul's 42 helped India secure the win in Dubai.

Virat Kohli the greatest One-Day cricketer of all time: Michael Clarke Champions Trophy 2025: Michael Clarke heaped praise on Virat Kohli after the Indian batter scored a match-winning 84 against Australia in the semi-final on Tuesday in Dubai.

Virat Kohli is arguably the best chaser the game has ever seen: Steve SmithAustralia captain Steve Smith heaped praise on Virat Kohli and called him the best chaser the game has ever seen after India made it to the final of the Champions Trophy 2025. Kohli scored a fine 84 to get his side over the line.

Virat Kohli, India smash records in Champions Trophy semifinal win: Stat packIndia stormed into their third successive final of the ICC Champions Trophy as they beat Australia by four wickets in the first semi-final in Dubai. Here's a look at India's remarkable win in numbers:

NZ vs SA semi-final: Former champions battle in a clash of evenly matched sidesIn a battle of former champions, New Zealand and South Africa lock horns in the semi-final of the Champions Trophy 2025, trying to enter another final. The match is expected to be an even contest with it being tough to predict the winner.

South Africa want to play their 'best cricket' in the semi-final: Bavuma Champions Trophy 2025: Skipper Temba Bavuma said that South Africa would want to put their best foot forward when they face New Zealand on Wednesday at the Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore.

India didn't have any 'undue advantage' in Dubai: Gautam Gambhir Champions Trophy 2025: Head coach Gautam Gambhir said that India haven't got any undue advantage in Dubai since it's a neutral venue for them. On Tuesday, India advanced to the final after beating Australia by four wickets.

Not buying into it: Steve Smith on India's Dubai advantage theoryChampions Trophy 2025: Skipper Steve Smith accepted defeat gracefully, saying that India outplayed Australia in the semi-final on Tuesday at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
